snippet.title: Born of Bread: Standalone Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
You can now play a demo of our game Born of Bread! It takes place in the first region of the game but follows its own side-story. We'd love for you to try it out and give us feedback!

Download it here:
Itchio https://wildarts.itch.io/bornofbread
Coming soon to Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1555140/

Twitter https://twitter.com/wildartsdevs
